news.content: The ELM Lab welcomes thesis students Kara Dudley and Virginia Schwarz and Undergraduate RAs Stefan Nevajdic, Jaclyn Reynolds, Julia Rowe, and Neha Sharma.

Last month, the ELM Lab presented our work at the 2025 Society for Philosophy and Psychology Conference in Ithaca, NY. Later this month, we'll be at the Cognitive Science Society Conference in San Francisco, CA!
Congrats to PhD student Madeline Klotz for presenting her first year talk to the Psychology Department at UNH!
Tucker Lane, Julie Fredricksen, and Skye Murphy will be presenting their research at the 2025 UNH Undergraduate Research Conference. Congrats to all three!
The ELM Lab welcomes lab manager Lyra Joson and Undergraduate RA Ella Curtis.
The ELM Lab welcomes PhD student Madeline Klotz and Undergraduate RAs Angel Eaton, Julie Fredricksen, Zach Gabriel, Tucker Lane, Skye Murphy, and Sydney Staples.
We're accepting PhD applications! Learn more here.
The ELM Lab will be opening in one year—August 2024!
